metadata.title: CVE-2022-1280 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability was found in drm_lease_held indrivers/gpu/drm/drm_lease.c in the Linux kernel due to a race problem. Thisflaw allows a local user privilege attacker to cause a denial of service(DoS) or a kernel information leak.
